title: Bladed Glove
info: The Bladed Glove is a rare fast-hitting melee weapon with short range that can drop only during the Halloween seasonal event. It can be a very effective weapon when fighting pre-hardmode melee enemies. The Bladed Glove is similar to the hardmode weapon, the Fetid Baghnakhs.
stat:
